Ryan Atkinson

Web Developer

About Ryan

Millenial native of Virginia Beach, Virginia with a technical mind and a pragmatic approach to life. Graduate of the Frontend Web Development course at The Iron Yard in St. Petersburg, Fl. Jack-of-all-trades. Enjoys debugging more than the next guy. He once re-organized a bookshelf full of engineering reports to correspond to color theory.

Comes alive when condensing logic, editing copy, and imparting structure onto his surroundings. Web Development finally connected his love of design, language, and meaningful problem-solving. Can be found painstakingly attempting to meditate in your local coffee shop.

Download a copy of his resume! And print it out, because it looks goooooooood :)
